example.eg: They're paying me an hourly rate to distribute these flyers.
example.egtrans: 发传单的工资按小时结。

example.eg: The teacher distributed handouts to everyone in the class.
example.egtrans: 老师给班上所有人分发讲义。

example.eg: The party promised to tax the rich more heavily and distribute the wealth more fairly.
example.egtrans: 该党承诺向富人征收更为严苛的税收，并更为公平地分配社会财产。

example.eg: The estate was distributed equally among the four children.
example.egtrans: 房产被均分给了四位孩子。
